goal.en: The goal of this course is to learn the basic principles and techniques of digital signal processing as a foundation for learning advanced courses related to digital signal processing.
goal.ch: 學習數位訊號處理之基礎原理與技術,以作為修習進階數位訊號處理課程之基礎。

content.en:
週次 內容 備註
1 Introduction of Signal and Signal Processing
2 Discrete-Time Signal and Systems
3 Discrete-Time Signal and Systems
4 Discrete-Time Fourier Transform
5 Discrete-Time Fourier Transform
6 Digital Processing of Continuous-Time Signals
7 Finite-Length Discrete Transforms
8 Finite-Length Discrete Transforms
9 Mid-Term Exam
10 z-Transform
11 z-Transform
12 LTI Discrete-Time Systems in the Transform Domain
13 Digital Filter Structures
14 FIR Digital Filter Design
15 DSP Algorithm Implementation
16 DSP Algorithm Implementation
17 Multirate Digital Signal Processing Fundamentals
18 Term Exam
content.ch:
週次 內容 備註
1 Introduction of Signal and Signal Processing
2 Discrete-Time Signal and Systems
3 Discrete-Time Signal and Systems
4 Discrete-Time Fourier Transform
5 Discrete-Time Fourier Transform
6 Digital Processing of Continuous-Time Signals
7 Finite-Length Discrete Transforms
8 Finite-Length Discrete Transforms
9 Mid-Term Exam
10 z-Transform
11 z-Transform
12 LTI Discrete-Time Systems in the Transform Domain
13 Digital Filter Structures
14 FIR Digital Filter Design
15 DSP Algorithm Implementation
16 DSP Algorithm Implementation
17 Multirate Digital Signal Processing Fundamentals
18 Term Exam

textbook.en: Text book：S. K. Mitra, Digital Signal Processing-A Computer-Based Approach, McGraw-Hill 滄海書局 Reference book:參考書：V. K. Ingle and J. G. Proakis, Digital Signal Processing using MATLAB, Thomson Learning Software：MATLAB
textbook.ch: 1.教科書(中文)：S. K. Mitra, Digital Signal Processing-A Computer-Based Approach, McGraw-Hill 滄海書局 教科書(英文)：S. K. Mitra, Digital Signal Processing-A Computer-Based Approach, McGraw-Hill 滄海書局 2.參考書(中文)：V. K. Ingle and J. G. Proakis, Digital Signal Processing using MATLAB, Thomson Learning 參考書(英文)：V. K. Ingle and J. G. Proakis, Digital Signal Processing using MATLAB, Thomson Learning 3.輔助教材：軟體：MATLAB

grading.en: 作業 30% 期中考 30% 期末考 30% 期末報告 10%
